title: FS: T206 Reds w/ HOF Griffith Huggins +Sovereign, Polar Bear

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Reds w/ HOF Griffith Huggins +Sovereign, Polar Bear
posts.post_content:
I have for sale several T206 singles.  They are all Cincinnati Reds players.  Shipping is $2 no matter how many cards you buy.  Prefer paypal, but check/money order is ok.  PM me.

Clark Griffith Batting (HOF) PSA 1 Piedmont 350-460 $55 SOLD
Miller Huggins Portrait (HOF) Piedmont 350 $42
Larry McLean Polar Bear $24 SOLD
Richard Hoblitzell Sovereign $19 SOLD
Dick Egan Polar Bear $15 SOLD
Billy Campbell Sovereign $12 SOLD
Harry Gasper Sovereign (Rip at the top) $10 SOLD
